argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | maxidlnr.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | maxidlnr.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ismaxidl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) <-> ( M e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ M =/= X /\ A. j e. ( Idl ` R ) ( M C_ j -> ( j = M \/ j = X ) ) ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) ) -> ( M e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ M =/= X /\ A. j e. ( Idl ` R ) ( M C_ j -> ( j = M \/ j = X ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simp3d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) ) -> A. j e. ( Idl ` R ) ( M C_ j -> ( j = M \/ j = X ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_sseq2 | |- ( j = I -> ( M C_ j <-> M C_ I ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqeq1 | |- ( j = I -> ( j = M <-> I = M ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqeq1 | |- ( j = I -> ( j = X <-> I = X ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_orbi12d | |- ( j = I -> ( ( j = M \/ j = X ) <-> ( I = M \/ I = X ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_imbi12d | |- ( j = I -> ( ( M C_ j -> ( j = M \/ j = X ) ) <-> ( M C_ I -> ( I = M \/ I = X ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rspcva | |- ( ( I e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ A. j e. ( Idl ` R ) ( M C_ j -> ( j = M \/ j = X ) ) ) -> ( M C_ I -> ( I = M \/ I = X ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( I e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ ( R e. RingOps /\ M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) ) ) -> ( M C_ I -> ( I = M \/ I = X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) ) /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> ( M C_ I -> ( I = M \/ I = X ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_impr | |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ M e. ( MaxIdl ` R ) ) /\ ( I e. ( Idl ` R ) /\ M C_ I ) ) -> ( I = M \/ I = X ) ) |
